name: Witch and the Serpent Moon
description:
A mysterious child named Kuu wants to swallow the world in an endless darkness by destroying the moon. Put an end to this and save the land of Hallow Hollow in this Touhou Project-inspired 2D shooter/bullet-hell!

Controls with the arrow keys, shift key, and spacebar, as well as the mouse. Currently a single boss fight.

Made as a final project for Programming for Creatives - UArts Class of '24!
